Type.Name: HTMLSaveReceiverFn

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool HTMLSaveReceiverFn(IntPtr engine, string data);
.class public auto ansi sealed HTMLSaveReceiverFn extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A delegate to receive HTML content from . In most cases, a delegate of this form probably saves HTML to a file, prints it, or similar.
